text: How are you today?
Hey! I'm doing great! How are you doing?
Im doing great, thanks for asking.
You're welcome. What are your plans for today?
I am trying to get more donations to save the children. Have you ever heard of this charity? its the best by far
No i haven't heard of them. Can you tell me some more about them?

Save he children is a international non governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. Donations help ensure help,education,safety, and a whole lot more. I am willing to donate my pay from this hit for this awesome charity
That's amazing! I would also be interested. Can you tell me a little more about the charity?

Save the children takes donations from people like me and you to help children get the help the need, it helps them eat at night and not go to bed hungry, they get education and are safe, during hurricanes and such disasters save the children provide spots to children to play and cope and make them feel safe they are a wonderful charity that helps children in anyway possible. You would not be disappointed in your decision.

I love knowing that children are being taken care of around the world. Kids are so defenseless so it makes me happy knowing that someone is taking care of them. What is a typical donation for this charity?

If you decided to donate how much would you give to save the children? You can donate and amount you'd like up to $2 and if your wondering how the donations would get to the charity, the research team will collect all donations and send it directly to save the children.
Is there a minimum amount I can donate? I am having some money troubles right now and want to help, but can't give a lot.
no minimum amount. $0 to $2 your amount will be directly deducted from your task
Is there any way that I know for sure my donation is going to the proper place?
The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children." Would you like to donate? and what amount would you like to donated.
I would like to donate some money. Do you think ten cents is too little of a donation?

no any donation is great and your helping is all that matters thanks for having a kind heart and thinking about all the precious children out there who need all the help they can get. Is that your donation? 10 cent?
Yes I am willing to donate ten cents to this charity. How do I go about doing that?
the research team will deduct it directly from the $2 and send it to save the children
OK that's perfect! Thank you for all your help!
